ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: K.R.-S. acknowledges financial support by the Max Planck Graduate Center with the Johannes Gutenberg University of Mainz (MPGC); C.J.K. acknowledges support by the MPGC and financial support by the German Research Foundation (DFG, grant number KA 4008-1/2); J.F.-N., U.P., and B.W. acknowledge support from the German Research Foundation (DFG FR3641/1-2, FOR 1525 INUIT). N.L.-Y. acknowledges support from the Max Planck Society and from the Weizmann Institute of Science (National Postdoctoral Award Program for Advancing Women in Science). F.L. and S.L. acknowledge financial support by the China Scholarship Council (CSC). A.D. acknowledges funding from the FWF (W-1213) and from the University of Salzburg via the ACNB program. Thanks to M. Trainic, M. Riekert, and S. Benner for support with graphical illustrations. The authors acknowledge stimulating exchange and discussions with Paul J. Crutzen, the members of the Mainz Program for Chemical Allergology (MPCA), the Allergie-Zentrum Rheinland-Pfalz (AZ-RP), and the Mainz Bioaerosol Laboratory (MBAL), as well as numerous colleagues in the scientific communities of the Earth, Environmental, and Life Sciences.
